TopicTitle: Space station into asteroid mission, unable to finish

Articles.Content:
**KSP Version: v1.0.2.842 Windows 64-bit**

Hello,

I performed the mission requesting to create a space station "into an asteroid", and I'm stucked, because the game seems refuse to acknowledge that a space station docked to an asteroid is a space station:

 [http://imgur.com/a/mYFVZ](http://imgur.com/a/mYFVZ)

When I'm not connected to the asteroid, the game acknowledge that I build the required space station ( antenna, docking port, and power), but as soon as I dock with an asteroid with the CLAW, the game acknowledge I made a facility "into a class D asteroid", but is now refusing to recognise the "space station", making the mission impossible to finish.

Am I missing something?![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

Thanks for the awesome game !

Kanchi

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-19T06:45:24Z" title="05/19/2015 06:45  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 19, 2015</time> by Kanchi**
I'm stuck in the exact same place... I haven't been able to find a fix for it either. =/

The contracts stipulate that the station has to be new, not an old station re-purposed, so please ensure your station was launched after accepting the contract.

You can end the contract if you want by setting it as complete in the alt+F12 menu.

The contract states that I need to do the following:

Build a new orbital station around the Mun.

- Put your station in orbit of the Mun
- Build a new station that has an antenna, a docking port, and can generate power.
- Have a facility supporting at least nine kerbals.
- Have a research lab at the station.
- Have 6,000 units of liquid fuel in your station.
- Build the facility into a Class D asteroid.
- Maintain stability for ten seconds.

I accepted the contract, built a NEW station from scratch, captured an asteroid, and finally placed the whole thing in a Munar orbit. When I captured the asteroid, I got credit for everything except "Put the station in orbit of the Mun."

Once I got it into orbit around the Mun, the credit I got for "Build a new station that has an antenna, a docking port, and can generate power." was wiped out for some reason.
